reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://acc-test.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
MPX is already configured.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content types' menu link.
Click the 'Add content type' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content types dialog'.
Enter 'MPX164885b183' in the 'Name' text box.
Click the 'Save and add fields' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX164885b183 dialog'.
Enter 'MPXVideoEntityfbfbce9fb5' in the 'Add new field' text box.
Select 'Entity Reference' from the 'Field Type' drop down list.
Select 'Select list' from the 'Widget' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPXVideoEntityfbfbce9fb5 dialog'.
Select the 'File' option from the 'Target type' drop down list.
Select the 'Simple (with optional filter by bundle)' option from the 'Mode' drop down list.
Chech the 'MPX Video for Account "DB TV" (2312945284) ' 'Target bundles' check box.
Select the 'Don't sort' option from the 'Sort by' drop down list.
Click the 'Save field settings' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPXVideoEntityfbfbce9fb5 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Updated field MPXVideoEntityfbfbce9fb5 field settings.' is present.
Click the 'Save settings' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX164885b183 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Saved MPXVideoEntityfbfbce9fb5 configuration.' is present.

Switch to the active frame titled 'MPXVideoFilebc104cef0e dialog'.
Click the 'Public files' radio button.
Click the 'Save field settings' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPXVideoFilebc104cef0e dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Updated field MPXVideoFilebc104cef0e field settings.' is present.
